subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Jim Larranaga and Miami will face Marquette at Verizon Center, the same arena where his George Mason team upset Connecticut seven years ago and gained unexpected national exposure.
snippet: Jim Larranaga and Miami will face Marquette at Verizon Center, the same arena where his George Mason team upset Connecticut seven years ago and gained unexpected national exposure.
